attributes.action: P.M. to tell citizens on the news" the ambulance  is NOT an emergency service "
attributes.background: The ambulance services should be emergency services just like the fire and rescue

rejection.details:
The Government does not control what appears on the news. If you would like the Government to run a public awareness campaign about this, you could start a petition calling for that.

We already have a petition calling for the ambulance service to be an emergency service:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/120187
